prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a dimly lit modern office at night. Rows of empty desks, no people — the office is automated now. Above the desks, a beautiful network of glowing blue holographic workflow connections floats in the air like a constellation — abstract circles and flowing lines representing automated business processes running themselves. Blue and teal light reflects softly on the desk surfaces. Deep dark navy atmosphere, moody corporate photography feel. No text. Premium SaaS hero image aesthetic.
